fields.name: AvailabilityZone
fields.description: If the data center has Availability Zone support, apply it to the Virtual Machine ScaleSet that host the cassandra data center virtual machines.

fields.name: BackupStorageCustomerKeyUri
fields.description: Indicates the Key Uri of the customer key to use for encryption of the backup storage account.

fields.name: Base64EncodedCassandraYamlFragment
fields.description: A fragment of a cassandra.yaml configuration file to be included in the cassandra.yaml for all nodes in this data center. The fragment should be Base64 encoded, and only a subset of keys are allowed.

fields.name: DataCenterLocation
fields.description: The region this data center should be created in.

fields.name: Deallocated
fields.description: Whether the data center has been deallocated.

fields.name: DelegatedSubnetId
fields.description: Resource id of a subnet the nodes in this data center should have their network interfaces connected to. The subnet must be in the same region specified in 'dataCenterLocation' and must be able to route to the subnet specified in the cluster's 'delegatedManagementSubnetId' property. This resource id will be of the form '/subscriptions/<subscription id>/resourceGroups/<resource group>/providers/Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/<virtual network>/subnets/<subnet>'.

fields.name: DiskCapacity
fields.description: Number of disks attached to each node. Default is 4.

fields.name: DiskSku
fields.description: Disk SKU used for data centers. Default value is P30.

fields.name: ManagedDiskCustomerKeyUri
fields.description: Key uri to use for encryption of managed disks. Ensure the system assigned identity of the cluster has been assigned appropriate permissions(key get/wrap/unwrap permissions) on the key.

fields.name: NodeCount
fields.description: The number of nodes the data center should have. This is the desired number. After it is set, it may take some time for the data center to be scaled to match. To monitor the number of nodes and their status, use the fetchNodeStatus method on the cluster.

fields.name: SeedNodes
fields.description: IP addresses for seed nodes in this data center. This is for reference. Generally you will want to use the seedNodes property on the cluster, which aggregates the seed nodes from all data centers in the cluster.

fields.name: Sku
fields.description: Virtual Machine SKU used for data centers. Default value is Standard_DS14_v2
